Text:
Ugh, what's up with the distracting, intense dynamic compression? Only about 3db of dynamic range left, lots of pumping and severe clipping distortion.

Nearly unlistenable.

Surely the tracks didn't come this way from the CD.

Never mind my last comment, i'm an idiot; bad settings on my own equipment.

I'm an ass.

Thank you for this.

TalkTalk is a VERY underrated, very overlooked band ....
